languages.text: Влиятельный губернатор орбитальной станции-дворца Ведаведа был приговорен к смерти Лорд-инквизитором Калькасаром. Время направить своих агентов в его владения, чтобы поучаствовать в разграблении имущества покойного и заполучить, к примеру, принадлежавшие ему флогистоновые копи планеты Кирна.

The powerful governor of the orbital palace station of Weddawedda has been sentenced to death by Lord Inquisitor Calcazar. Now is a good time to send agents to his domain to partake in dividing the late governor's fortunes, such as his flogiston mines on the planet Kyrn.
languages.original_text: Влиятельный губернатор орбитальной станции-дворца Ведаведа был приговорен к смерти Лорд-инквизитором Калькасаром. Время направить своих агентов в его владения, чтобы поучаствовать в разграблении имущества покойного и заполучить, к примеру, принадлежавшие ему флогистоновые копи планеты Кирна.

traits.locale_text: The powerful governor of the orbital palace station of Weddawedda has been sentenced to death by Lord Inquisitor Calcazar. Now is a good time to send agents to his domain to partake in dividing the late governor's fortunes, such as his flogiston mines on the planet Kyrn.

The powerful governor of the orbital palace station of Weddawedda has been sentenced to death by Lord Inquisitor Calcazar. Now is a good time to send agents to his domain to partake in dividing the late governor's fortunes, such as his flogiston mines on the planet Kyrn.

The powerful governor of the orbital palace station of Weddawedda has been sentenced to death by Lord Inquisitor Calcazar. Now is a good time to send agents to his domain to partake in dividing the late governor's fortunes, such as his flogiston mines on the planet Kyrn.

The powerful governor of the orbital palace station of Weddawedda has been sentenced to death by Lord Inquisitor Calcazar. Now is a good time to send agents to his domain to partake in dividing the late governor's fortunes, such as his flogiston mines on the planet Kyrn.

The powerful governor of the orbital palace station of Weddawedda has been sentenced to death by Lord Inquisitor Calcazar. Now is a good time to send agents to his domain to partake in dividing the late governor's fortunes, such as his flogiston mines on the planet Kyrn.

languages.text: Le puissant gouverneur de la station-palais orbitale de Weddawedda a été condamné à mort par le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar. C'est le moment idéal pour envoyer des agents dans le domaine du défunt gouverneur afin de partager ses biens, comme ses mines de flogiston sur la planète Kyrn.
languages.original_text: The powerful governor of the orbital palace station of Weddawedda has been sentenced to death by Lord Inquisitor Calcazar. Now is a good time to send agents to his domain to partake in dividing the late governor's fortunes, such as his flogiston mines on the planet Kyrn.

traits.locale_text: Le puissant gouverneur de la station-palais orbitale de Weddawedda a été condamné à mort par le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar. C'est le moment idéal pour envoyer des agents dans le domaine du défunt gouverneur afin de partager ses biens, comme ses mines de flogiston sur la planète Kyrn.

languages.text: ウェッダウェッダの軌道宮殿ステーションの有力な総督が、ロード・インクィジターのカルカサルによって死刑を宣告された。今こそ惑星カーンのフロギストン鉱山など、亡き総督の財産分与に参加するため、彼の領地に諜報員を送り込む良い機会だ。
languages.original_text: The powerful governor of the orbital palace station of Weddawedda has been sentenced to death by Lord Inquisitor Calcazar. Now is a good time to send agents to his domain to partake in dividing the late governor's fortunes, such as his flogiston mines on the planet Kyrn.

traits.locale_text: ウェッダウェッダの軌道宮殿ステーションの有力な総督が、ロード・インクィジターのカルカサルによって死刑を宣告された。今こそ惑星カーンのフロギストン鉱山など、亡き総督の財産分与に参加するため、彼の領地に諜報員を送り込む良い機会だ。

languages.text: 大审判官卡尔卡扎下令，对维达韦达世界轨道宫殿空间站的总督处以死刑。现在正是派出特工前往瓜分遗产的好时机。这位生前呼风唤雨的总督留下了巨额的财富，包括基林行星上的燃素矿。
languages.original_text: The powerful governor of the orbital palace station of Weddawedda has been sentenced to death by Lord Inquisitor Calcazar. Now is a good time to send agents to his domain to partake in dividing the late governor's fortunes, such as his flogiston mines on the planet Kyrn.

traits.locale_text: 审判长卡尔卡扎下令，对维达维达世界轨道宫殿空间站的总督处以死刑。现在正是派出特工前往瓜分遗产的好时机。这位生前呼风唤雨的总督留下了巨额的财富，包括基林行星上的燃素矿。

languages.text: El poderoso gobernador de la estación del palacio orbital de Weddawedda ha sido condenado a muerte por el Lord Inquisidor Calcazar. Ahora es un buen momento para enviar agentes a sus dominios para participar en el reparto de las fortunas del difunto gobernador, como sus minas de flogisto en el planeta Kyrn.
languages.original_text: The powerful governor of the orbital palace station of Weddawedda has been sentenced to death by Lord Inquisitor Calcazar. Now is a good time to send agents to his domain to partake in dividing the late governor's fortunes, such as his flogiston mines on the planet Kyrn.

traits.locale_text: El poderoso gobernador de la estación del palacio orbital de Weddawedda ha sido condenado a muerte por el Lord Inquisidor Calcazar. Ahora es un buen momento para enviar agentes a sus dominios para participar en el reparto de las fortunas del difunto gobernador, como sus minas de flogisto en el planeta Kyrn.

languages.text: Der mächtige Gouverneur der orbitalen Palaststation Weddawedda wurde von Großinquisitor Calcazar zum Tode verurteilt. Das wäre ein guter Zeitpunkt, um Agenten in sein Reich zu schicken, die den Reichtum des verstorbenen Gouverneurs aufteilen, beispielsweise seine Flogiston-Minen auf dem Planeten Kyrn.
languages.original_text: The powerful governor of the orbital palace station of Weddawedda has been sentenced to death by Lord Inquisitor Calcazar. Now is a good time to send agents to his domain to partake in dividing the late governor's fortunes, such as his flogiston mines on the planet Kyrn.

traits.locale_text: Der mächtige Gouverneur der orbitalen Palaststation Weddawedda wurde von Großinquisitor Calcazar zum Tode verurteilt. Das wäre ein guter Zeitpunkt, um Agenten in sein Reich zu schicken, die den Reichtum des verstorbenen Gouverneurs aufteilen, beispielsweise seine Flogiston-Minen auf dem Planeten Kyrn.
